item.title: textnets tutorial at #eurocss
item.description: I am excited to be given the opportunity to co-host a tutorial on the textnets package for R at the 2018 European Symposium Series on Societal Challenges with my amazing colleagues Taylor Brown and Marcus Mann. The symposium will take place in Cologne, Germany from December 5 to 7 with our workshop and many more scheduled for the first day of the event. NB: This post describes the tentative schedule and will be updated as we finalize the details for the tutorial.
